Portals.title: Shitcode Room Entrance
Portals.description: The hidden entrance behind the wall takes you here

Portals.title: Shitcode Room Exit
Portals.description: This takes you back outside where you came in at.

Portals.title: Gate to Level 7
Portals.description: This pocket area is can only be accessed by Level 7. This gate takes you back to the point of entry

Breakable Wall.title: Breakable Walls
Breakable Wall.description: Left click to break the wall.

Rel Por Stones.title: Rel Por Stone
Rel Por Stones.description: Teleports you to a nearby area. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 4
Stairs.description: This leads back to the Maze on Level 4

Stairs.title: Entrance to Blackrock Facility
Stairs.description: This leads to the Blackrock Facility

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 5
Stairs.description: This leads to the west part of Level 5

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 5
Stairs.description: This leads to the east part of Level 5

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 4
Stairs.description: This leads back to North West side of Level 4

Secret Passageways.title: Hidden zoo teleport
Secret Passageways.description: Say 'garoo garoo' to teleport to the platform with four silver gates on Level 2.

Secret Passageways.title: Shitcode Room
Secret Passageways.description: Walk behind the wall down a set of stairs to enter this room. There are two invisible stalkers within

Teleport Tiles.title: Teleport Tile
Teleport Tiles.description: Takes you back to colony. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Waystar.title: Waystar
Waystar.description: Summons a moongate to Colony for a short duration. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Confluence.title: Confluence
Confluence.description: Future location for the 'Confluence' mechanic. Will require the Timekeeper's Compass to utilize.

Bosses.title: Abyssal Executioner
Bosses.description: Special: Does multiple dashes that does heavy damage. It also applies bleed and poison. He will in addition spawn waves of mobs.

Bosses.title: The Barrier Warden
Bosses.description: Special: Does a pontiff style bomb

Bosses.title: The Book Wyrm
Bosses.description: Special: Does a large cone breath attack as well as targeted explosions at player locations. Will also summon additional dragons on many types.

Bosses.title: Greater Blackrock Elemental
Bosses.description: Special: Drops raining shards on the current target's location that inflict heavy bleeds. Easy to dodge. Very resistant to magic damage.

Revealers.title: Time Lurker
Revealers.description: Reveals in a large radius. Casts spells and does a backstab melee attack occasionally.

Revealers.title: Timeless Cursed
Revealers.description: Reveals in a large radius. Casts spells.

Knock.title: Knock
Knock.description:
All Doors within 3 tiles become opened and stay unlocked for 15 seconds
Each Chest within 3 tiles has a 50% chance to become unlocked

Shrine.title: Valor Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring the Valor Sword to this location. You can find the sword at randoms encounters on levels 1-4 containing two Ratmen and a body. Waves of enemies will spawn and a key will spawn on the ground. You take this to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward.

Shrine.title: Compassion Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring the Unstable Time Crystal to Tatters. He will give you a key to take to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward.

Shrine.title: Honor Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring Gwenno's Urn to the Cemetary. This can be found on Level 3 in a chest in the back of the Ankh room. You must have atleast one player in the shrine area at each interval. Defend against waves of monsters for 5 minutes and you will get a key to take to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward.

Chests.title: Metal Chest
Chests.description: This chest is locked and requires a knock rune to open. Can contain special/rare loot.

Chests.title: Wooden Chest
Chests.description: This chest is unlocked and can contain special/rare loot.

Rare Spawns.title: Dirty Plate
Rare Spawns.description: Spawns in a container in this locked room..

Crystal Pedestals.title: Leper's Curse
Crystal Pedestals.description: This curse increase's damage taken. Left click to break the crystal.

Crystal Pedestals.title: Pilgrim's Curse
Crystal Pedestals.description: This curse reduces damage dealt. Left click to break the crystal.
